name: Galaxity Beta
description: Galaxity is a wonderful virtual world. In this game, you can create an avatar and customize it with a variety of costumes. You can also talk to people and become friends with them. Join Galaxity, and enjoy various mini-games and fun videos together!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7 or higher Processor: Core i5-4430 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7 or higher Processor: Core i5-4430 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
